data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Ora Clark, 1865 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) in Argentina (part I) — descriptions of new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Libonatti, María Laura (2014): A revision of the genus Ora Clark, 1865 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) in Argentina (part I) — descriptions of new species. Zootaxa 3884 (1): 27-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3884.1.2
